parameters.name: OriginPointEntity
parameters.description: Entity (vertex, point, midpoint, or the default point of origin on a part or assembly) for the coordinate system origin

parameters.name: XAxisEntities
parameters.description: Array of entities (vertex, point, or midpoint; linear edge or sketch line; non-linear edge or sketch entity; or planar face) for the x axis

parameters.name: YAxisEntities
parameters.description: Array of entities (vertex, point, or midpoint; linear edge or sketch line; non-linear edge or sketch entity; or planar face) for the y axis

parameters.name: ZAxisEntities
parameters.description: Array of entities (vertex, point, or midpoint; linear edge or sketch line; non-linear edge or sketch entity; or planar face) for the z axis

title: IFeatureManager.CreateCoordinateSystem
description: Creates a coordinate system feature using the specified entities.
signature:
Feature CreateCoordinateSystem( 
   System.Object
OriginPointEntity
,
   System.Object
XAxisEntities
,
   System.Object
YAxisEntities
,
   System.Object
ZAxisEntities
)

parameters.name: OriginPointEntity
parameters.description: Entity (vertex, point, midpoint, or the default point of origin on a part or assembly) for the coordinate system origin

parameters.name: XAxisEntities
parameters.description: Array of entities (vertex, point, or midpoint; linear edge or sketch line; non-linear edge or sketch entity; or planar face) for the x axis

parameters.name: YAxisEntities
parameters.description: Array of entities (vertex, point, or midpoint; linear edge or sketch line; non-linear edge or sketch entity; or planar face) for the y axis

parameters.name: ZAxisEntities
parameters.description: Array of entities (vertex, point, or midpoint; linear edge or sketch line; non-linear edge or sketch entity; or planar face) for the z axis
